description.value: Courser centaurs are swift and strong, trained in the art of jousting, an old centaur war technique requiring speed, aim, and a strong grip. While still effective in war, jousting has more recently become a public sport.

system.classDetails:
Courser Centaur Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Strength increases by 1.
  • Weapon Proficiency: You have proficiency in Lances, Glaives, and Pikes.
  • Armor Proficiency: You have proficiency in Light and Medium Armor.
  • Faint-Hearted: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.WM0L47S0SBMKALDW]{Faint-Hearted}
  • Joust: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.3XRM18PRXTZGV9HF]{Joust}
  • *Alternate Compatibility: You can choose to instead have the Hominid compatibility for the sake of mix-racing, gaining the following traits.
    • Increased Move Speed: Your movement speed is increased by +5ft.
